uvi.description:
mac80211: remove warning in ieee80211_get_sband()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.129 by commit ae9de9444b54c867c9fc1383a6dcba1018cddaea. For more details please see the references link.
